pages.text: He will send on you abundant rain from the sky
and will help you with wealth and sons and He will make gardens for you and He will make rivers for you
What is (wrong) with you, do you not expect God to be serious (about the above promises)
And He has created you (through) different stages
Did you not consider how God created the seven skies (higher levels) in accordance with each other
and made the moon therein (a source of reflected) light and made the sun a lamp
And God caused you to grow from the earth (as a) growth
then He returns you into it and He will bring you out, a bringing out
And God has made the earth a wide expanse for you
that you may move therein on wide ways.”
Noah said, “My Lord, they disobeyed me, and followed him whose wealth and children added to him nothing but loss
And they planned a great plan
And they said: Do not leave your gods, nor leave Wadd, nor Suwa nor Yagus and Yauq and Nasr
And they have misled many, and You do not (give) increase to the unjust persons in anything but error.”
They were drowned because of their faults, then made to enter the fire, and they did not find for themselves any helpers besides God
And Noah said, “My Lord! do not leave on the earth any dweller from among the disbelievers
for if you leave them they will mislead your servants and they will not give birth to any but transgressing, ungrateful (children)

My Lord ! protectively forgive me and my parents and him who enters my house as a believer, and the believing men and the believing women and do not (give) increase to the unjust persons, in anything but ruin.”
